itunes:title: Episode 240 - F**k That California Teacher
title: Episode 240 - F**k That California Teacher
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, Jarred Taylor, and Evan Hafer go all in on Gregory Salcido, the California teacher who told his students his that being in the military was: “Think about the people who you know who are over there. Your freaking stupid Uncle Lou...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson, Mat Best, Jarred Taylor, and Evan Hafer go all in on Gregory Salcido, the California teacher who told his students his that being in the military was: “Think about the people who you know who are over there. Your freaking stupid Uncle Louie or whatever. They’re dumbs‑‑‑s. They’re not like high-level thinkers, they’re not academic people, they’re not intellectual people. They’re the lowest of our low.”

Needless to say we had some choice words for him.
